text: The SQL forwarding agent inserts UDR data into a database table according to your definitions of mapping between UDR fields and database table columns. The agent also enables you to populate database columns with MIM values either by using a plain SQL statement or by invoking a stored procedure that inserts the data. Note! Supported database commands depend on the JDBC driver of the database. The section contains the following subsections: SQL Forwarding Agent Configuration - Batch SQL Forwarding Agent Transaction Behavior, Input/Output Data and MIM - Batch SQL Forwarding Agent Events - Batch Handling Erroneous UDRs - Batch
title: SQL Forwarding Agent in Batch Workflows - MediationZone Documentation 9.4 - InfoZone
